nodes.text: A planetoid was located on the edge of the Vesla system in the Outer Rim Territories. Originally a warm world. In c. 3643 BBY a native predator species began to suffer when the Sun Razer began to destroy the system's star under the orders of Darth Mekhis, and the Republic Strategic Information Service agent Theron Shan constructed a spy ray on the planetoid with the help of Jedi Master Ngani Zho and Teff'ith.
